1074360.name: Rogue Empire: Dungeon Crawler RPG - HQ Story Art
1074360.description:
As requested by many, this small DLC contains the in game illustrations in high quality for you to enjoy! Fair Warning: These images can be considered as spoilers to the game's story! Steam store images are taken from game intro and race selection, so you are safe to check them out!

Enjoy beautiful illustrations of the races of Ethistos, the scenes of Eghoss's Tale as well as the more dark themed images of the Dawn of Shadows campaign!

The DLC contains:
  • 7 illustrations of the races of Ethistos (one for each race)!
  • 6 illustrations of Eghoss's Tale from start to finish!
  • 18 illustrations of the Dawn of Shadows Campaign!
  • 2 bonus concept art illustrations not seen in-game.
1074360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
